data.name: richTextBox1.Text
data.value:
Version 0.1.4.0: *Changed: Small changes to the GUI. *Fixed: Small bugs
Version 0.1.3.8: *Added: Appplication can be minimized to tray by pressing the ESc key *Added: new Posts can be marked with bold font/ different background color. *Changed: Post viewer GUI improved.
Version 0.1.3.7: *Fixed: Application Lost Focus on Message Dialogs
Version 0.1.3.5: *Added: Columns Selection is now remembered on next run.
Version 0.1.3.4: *Fixed: small notifications bug
Version 0.1.3.3: *Changed: Search is now not case-sensitive *Changed: NotifyIcon show popups only when user active in the last 10 minutes.
Version 0.1.3.2: *Added: Fast Disable/enable Feed Button. *Added: Auto Sorting by unread items in feeds list.
Version 0.1.3.1: *Fixed: Notify Icon Exception when Outlook form is closed
Version 0.1.3.0: *Added: search capability Improved. *Changed: Datagridview replaced with a custom Listview for better perfomance and functionality.
Version 0.1.2.9: *Added: Basic search capability.
Version 0.1.2.8: *Changed: Major code redesigned *Added: Feed can be grouped in user defined categories *Added: different text encodings support. *Fixed: Some bugs fixed *Added: more GUI feedback for the user
Version 0.1.2.3: *Added: Feeds can now be saved to HTML file.
Version 0.1.2.2: *Added: Individual post history can be disabled so no new posts will be added under the same post. *Added: Some posts viewer error handling (invalid scripts, etc)
Version 0.1.2.1: *Changed: Main RSS form GUI updates
Version 0.1.2.0: *Changed: Complete redesign of Full RSS screen *Added: many improvments to main RSS form GUI *Fixed: Some bugs fixes and code cleanup.
Version 0.1.1.9: *Changed: Some GUI changes and improvements. *Added: Feeds can now be saved to disk on every refresh (with new content) or just on app's closing. *Added: RSS columns are now selectable (right click on the table headers). *Added: Some Outlook operations can done from within the app's GUI (reply, delete). *Fixed: Small bugs fixes.
Version 0.1.1.8: *Added: Log of RSS online activites (file -> View log operations). *Added: Full RSS Mode
Version 0.1.1.7: *Added: settings and feeds can be save per user or for all users. *Added: non active feeds are marked with gray color in the specific feed selection list.
Version 0.1.1.6: *Added: user can refresh specific feed from web.
Version 0.1.1.5: *Added: Gmail Support. *Added: Quick RSS Selection. *Fixed: some bugs fixed.
Version 0.1.1.4: *Added: Quick feed contebt viewer in main Form. *Added: Network Statistics information. *Changed: small improvements and new fetures in RSS settings form. *Fixed: some bugs fixed.
Version 0.1.1.0: *added: Application Settings form redesigned. *added : Mail and RSS have their own timers. *Fixed: Some GUI texts.
September 2011 (Version 0.1.0.0): *added: Basic functionality.
